document_data.caption: Pelauvir's Counter sits at center of the Waymoot
document_data.name: Pelauvir's Counter
document_data.mainbody: '''Pelauvir's Counter''' was a general store and the site of a former warehouse in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This store was located along the major intersection [[Waymoot (Waterdeep)|Waymoot]],
document_data.Services: This general store sold almost everything except food,
document_data.Inhabitants: In the midâ€’14{{th}} century [[DR]], Pelauvir's Counter was owned by [[Braum Pelauvir]].
